website_summaries.verdict: Dial control air fryer makes this version ideal if wanting a more traditional appliance.
pros: This air fryer offers many cooking options
Indicator light lets you know when desired temperature has been reached
cons: Customers complained of rust and the heating element no longer working

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer! We have only had a few days and have made perfectly crisp tofu, fried tilapia, fried potatoes, baked potato, and Chinese dumplings. It cleans up with just a damp cloth or a quick rinse. Could not be happier with how much time it saves with such awesome and healthy results! Wish it had a shelf but that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Coating on basket comes off!
customer_reviews.text: Received my air fryer in January and have used 1-2x weekly sometimes less. Normally to cook bacon or chicken in. Have followed all cleaning instructions, never in dishwasher, hand washed it always and now as pic shows the coating is coming off. Was going to contact company but they only have a 30 day guarantee, now I see why!! Defense wouldn’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Metal pieces in food
customer_reviews.text: Appliances should not leave debris in your food. That is just what this did after little over a year of use. Making french fries one day, I opened the drawer to find this nut and lockwasher in our food. What if someone had eaten it? Never mind the fact that now I need to get these back into the unit somehow and I can't easily gain access.
customer_reviews.author: Josher Monstruo

customer_reviews.title: This machine would burned my house if I had not ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine would burned my house if I had not been able to extinguish the fire that caused it. I do not know how it ignited a fire. Luckily my sister was with me and helped me to set fire before it was spread in the house
customer_reviews.author: tuma

customer_reviews.title: The Air Fryer is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This item is incredible!! Throw out your deep fryer and get healthy. This makes awesome fries, frozen or homemade. Last night I made pork chops that my husband, the fried food King, said we're the best he ever had!! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it! I’ve made Mac n cheese bites, falafel, and hash browns. Everything came out crunchy and toasted. It is much larger than I expected so I will have to find somewhere to store it. Caution: make sure when you eject the basket from the bottom piece you are close to a counter - mine went flying into the ground and chipped already. Slight new weird smell when cooking (I did wash with warm soapy water first), but it was most likely fade away.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Too small, hard to clean....
customer_reviews.text: The capacity of this air fryer is disappointing and the cooking basket is hard to clean. This may work if you are cooking for one person, but you still have to find a way to clean the basket. I have tried to clean the basket immediately after emptying the food out, tried soaking it, and tried non-stick sprays on it....nothing makes it any easier to clean. This has not been used in many months and is sitting on a shelf in my storage room.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Make counter space; Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand because of price. A relatively inexpensive way to check out air frying. Have only had for 2 weeks, so I, too, may find it does not last. I use it every day and just love how great the food tastes: Best salmon ever and love to make fries from sweet potatoes and turnips; Also roasted peppers and Brussels sprouts are perfect and is so nice to leave oven off. I usually cook for one or two—think would want a larger capacity air fryer if cooking for more. If this one breaks I would definitely replace given ease of use and great tasting healthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Floyd

customer_reviews.title: The fryer has done everything we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We have had the fryer for over two years and we feel that this review makes a statement about workmanship. We use the fryer about 2-3 times a month and it has performed with out any issues. It's great for doing meals for two or three people. The best thing is cooking without heating up the oven. We have had no issues with the unit at all. One of the best things is doing smaller frozen foods like french fries or any other food requiring being cooked in the oven. This way you are not heating up the oven or your home.
customer_reviews.author: keyriverguy

customer_reviews.title: My husband swears his chicken is so much better in this product Fries did well
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears his chicken is so much better in this product Fries did well..I am looking forward to trying other recipes it is bigger than I expected but when something works..we make room. LOL I am pleased with the fryer and the price was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Inner liner pan self ejects from the outer pan upon pulling out from main unit. (9 months use)
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this fryer. It has worked quite well for about 8-9 months. The main heating unit itself works flawlessly. In about the 8 month period though; the inner pan self ejects from the outer pan; making for quite a surprising; possibly dangerous event; if you are not ready with a hot pad under it. Upon inspection of the handle assembly; the four nuts/screws are tight; but the inner plastic sandwiched between the head of the screw and the nut; has become quite sloppy; allowing for it to eject automatically, after heating food. I have been trying to contact GoWISE; but there doesn't appear to be a way to correspond with them on their website link with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: A great energy saver.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic little air fryer. I love that I can use it and not have to heat up the big oven. I've used it for all sorts of things I would oven bake or fry- salmon, to crisp frozen foods... it's a great time and energy saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased "USED" with supposed blemishes:
customer_reviews.text: Examined the unit in detail upon delivery. Could not identify any blemishes whatsoever. Saved about 10%/MORE by being FRUGAL. Delighted with its operation and clean-up! Talked with Customer Service about "some negative reviews" asserting the coating was unstable and peeled away within the first 90 days. They assured me the WARRANTY had been extended to cover All Related Parts & the AIR FRYER for a "Full Twelve Months"!
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES R. RIPPLINGER

customer_reviews.title: Great...until it stops working and is out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: I loved this air fryer. It's great for a ton of things, meat, veggies, crisping up leftovers, etc. We use it many times a week. However, just over the 1 year mark after purchasing it, it suddenly and inexplicably stopped heating and GoWISE customer service informed me that it's out of warranty. Basically I'll have to purchase an entirely new machine. Seriously displeased about that. Will look into more expensive machines from other brands that will actually last, with customer service that will take care of me if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyBelle

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I like the Manuel controls vs anything digital Next to my coffee pot and microwave it's easily the most used appliance in my kitchen Fries are great and many frozen foods that I would never heat up my oven for a single serving. I also make brownies from scratch. Perfect size for 1 or 2 people. The only thing I dislike is the fry basket often disconnects when you remove it from the machine. The lock mechanism holding the fry basket to the removable plastic bin needs improvement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had nothing but good luck. I do wish it came with some ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time! Fried chicken comes out crispy; fried pickles with bacon don't come out soggy! I have had nothing but good luck. I do wish it came with some better cook temp/time instructions; I had to look them up online. You should be aware that the basket on this is fairly small. I was able to just barely fit in 4 drumsticks with a bit of room all around them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Schlatter

customer_reviews.title: Finally - Fast Fries for the Whole Family
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my tater-tot-obsessed, french-fry-loving husband for Christmas. He loves the fact that he can make fries in less than half the time than it used to take, and I love the fact that I can finally enjoy his starchy sides with him since we use almost no fat/oil compared to traditional fries!
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you hate grease this is the way to go! I love my air fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: love this fryer
customer_reviews.text: love this fryer. since receiving this I have used it almost every day. compared to the other fryers on the market it is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: queen

customer_reviews.title: Crispy wings and fries, I'm in love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer. I am in love! I bought it as a Father's Day gift for my partner & I'm not certain who uses it more. There are larger and more expensive models out there but I am very happy with this purchase! Regardless of your culinary expertise you will find it easy to use! Crispy wings and fries w/out the grease! If you have considered buying one do it, You're not likely to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: carrmc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I did tons of research on air fryers before deciding to go with the GoWise 2nd Generation and I am so happy I did. It's very easy to use and everything I've made has turned out perfect. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good not great
customer_reviews.text: So overall it is good but if I wonder if the more expensive ones are better. I tried to cook chicken in it a few times and the inside was RAW. I also find potatoes are hard to cook in it. I like some vegetables and I like tofu in it but overall I am meh on it. So when people rave about air fryers I wonder if investing more money is a better decision. also this is HUGE. It takes a lot of space. Ultimately my Instant Pot still reigns high over this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Iacobacci

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bummer, used maybe 4-5 times...stopped heating. Timer is all that works. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as others, disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m dissatisfied with the temperature of this fryer. We should’ve have stayed with our tried and true GoWise, hence the name, it crisps and cooks a lot hotter than this one. It takes on average 3-4 minutes longer cooking time and if you go beyond that to get a crispy crust or top it dries out the food.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Timer broke with first use; not able to reset ...
customer_reviews.text: Timer broke with first use; not able to reset it and must allow to wind down in real time before resetting. Basket large enough for two servings only
customer_reviews.author: Pharmer

customer_reviews.title: ... is my first air fryer and I couldn't be happier. It makes fries super crispy & cooks other ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer and I couldn't be happier. It makes fries super crispy & cooks other things so well. The basket holds a lot of food and is also very easy to clean. For the price, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cooking, but hard to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a very long time, and it will cook things faster and better than you can imagine. But you have to clean it often and well. I recently moved, and got a different brand for my home, which made me realize how terrible cleaning this thing is. You let it accumulate and you're in for tons of soaking and scrubbing. I still gave it 3 stars for its incredible cooking ability and temperature range, as well as ease of general use.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Connor

customer_reviews.title: Heats super fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It works great and cooks super fast. You just have to be careful that the item your putting in it isn't too light or it'll get sucked up and burn. Ex. Hard shell taco shells. I tried heating them up In There instead of the oven and they got sucked up and was burning. Don't worry......youll smell it haha
customer_reviews.author: cluvsl

customer_reviews.title: Its a luxury not a necassity
customer_reviews.text: What these appliances actually are is they are a mini convection oven. It should use less power. It will heat the kitchen less. It really doesnt cook faster. If you know how to cook it wont save any fat calories. It has its place but it is what it is, a miniture oven
customer_reviews.author: bgbytoys

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is easy to use, easy to clean, and you can cook all kinds of things in it. I do wish that it came with cake tins that fit inside, since you can make baked goods in it if there are tins small enough.
customer_reviews.author: Linlin

customer_reviews.title: Words very well. Timer is extremely accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Really appreciate this in the summer time. Now I don't have to heat up the entire kitchen just to make supper. Also takes a lot less electricity then cooking in the oven. You can online and find dozens of recipes (the jalapeno popper one is awesome).
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked fantastic for about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air fryer about 8 months ago. It has been the best addition to my kitchen since. I use it at least once a week for anything from frozen foods to whole chickens. After showing this to family and friends many of them became hooked and bought themselves one as well. The only complaint I have is that last week the machine stopped working. The timer ticks but heat and air are not pumped into the vessel. Huge bummer as I will likely need to find a new one to purchase now :(
customer_reviews.author: Nikela Gathje

customer_reviews.title: The perfect entry level air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife in January of 2018. At just under a year later, she likes it so much she asked for a mammoth 10qt air fryer. This model is very basic, but very versatile. It proves that you don't need all the complex bells and whistles that the higher end air fryers have, and is plenty big enough to feed a family of 2 or even 3. The only caveat with this model is that the basket isn't non-stick and can be tedious to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One of the better items for the kitchen I have found
customer_reviews.text: I use this about twice a week Wings and fries are the best. A little hard to clean if you spray with Pam first it helps.There was no receipt book but found one on google.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Kaluza

customer_reviews.title: I love my air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love my air fryer. I love that I can have crispy foods without the fat. I have cooked French fries, chicken strips, pork chops, steak and made croutons. Can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I have made some nice chicken fingers from scratch
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the Air Fryer but I am still in a "learning curve". It is a different way to cook, but I have made some nice chicken fingers from scratch....great! As a new user, I have especially enjoyed this fryer for preparing frozen fries, fish, and other items I would usually microwave....but now they are CRISPY. Definitely would recommend this item, in fact, I probably should have purchased the "larger" size where you can prepare different items on various racks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From skepticism to admiration!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome, so unbelievable I'm in love with this thing. I use it almost every day. I was a little skeptical because the price is way below of what you see on the market but let me advice you, you will be impressed. What a good purchase. Don't think... Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our air fryer. Easy to use, super easy cleanup and it really DOES make great fries/mozzerella sticks/fried mushrooms, etc with NO oil! I haven't used it for anything "fancier" yet but will try sandwiches soon. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in January and it has already stopped working. Used it exactly as the instructions specified!! Very annoyed!!
customer_reviews.author: Donnetrice Allison

customer_reviews.title: I fix my own sweet potato fries now!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Be careful about the hot exhaust coming from the rear. I melted the plastic fascia on my microwave door. Still works but looks a little wavy.
customer_reviews.author: phardog

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have purchased in forever. We have cooked everything in it, steaks, chicken, pork roasts everything comes out amazing. It is so easy to use even my 10 year old son can throw a little mini pizza in there for 5 minutes and it turns out super good.
customer_reviews.author: Jodeelynn

customer_reviews.title: It cooks so much better than a toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gadget. It has become indispensable in our kitchen. We use it every day. MKes excellent chicken wings. Also great tater tots and chicken nuggets. Today I cooked my chicken pot pie in it. Cleanup is a breeze. I love it and now sits on our counter for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Norman S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: From 5 star to 1 star
customer_reviews.text: After 13 months of use...loved it...talked several others into getting one, the flaking spots turned into rust spots and my air fryer is unusable. I’m still looking for solutions. Amazon, stock up on replacement baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Older but wiser

customer_reviews.title: Food tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Easy and food tastes good, crunchy like fried but without the grease. Very easy cleanup! Wish I would have gotten the smaller one the 3.7 is family size and takes up alot of counter room, didn't really need one that big but it's a keeper. Been a little Leary as I've seen on Facebook some that caught fire, not this brand but stay close by and always unplug
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen appliance bought. It perfectly makes hash browns, potato and sweet potato fries, roasts veggies to perfection, cleans up so easily. Simple controls, unlike all the other models, but it's really all you need. Max temperature is up to 400 and max timer is 30 minutes. Great deal and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: So far I have only cooked steak in this air fryer, but its much easier and consistent than using a pan during the winter. Very juicy steak i love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: like the simple set up of the GoWISE
customer_reviews.text: Copied from my review of the Della 1500W Multifunction Electric Air Fryer: I had used this product side-by-side with a GoWISE GW22622. Both performed very well and myself and my "guinea-pigs" were impressed with the concept of frying with (very) little or no oil. I did, however, like the simple set up of the GoWISE, it being a dial instead of a digital reading. The GoWISE also took less time to warm up. I couldn't say how Della's dial type fryer performs as a comparison. Both of them worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy clean-up, nice value
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far, making breakfast potatoes, and it was quick & easy! The potatoes came out crispy on the outside, and fluffy on the inside. It took about 25min total. Clean-up was a breeze; the basket and holder wiped clean with warm soap and water. I just ordered a vegan air fryer cookbook and am looking forward to using it much more!
customer_reviews.author: J L A

customer_reviews.title: No fuss no mess!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love making real fries with real potatoes. As close to frying as you can get without all the fatty oils! Takes up about the same space as a coffee maker. I recommend you buy at least a 3 qt. or larger. I almost went with a smaller one I'm glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food tastes very good, but this takes a lot longer to cook ...
customer_reviews.text: Food tastes very good, but this takes a lot longer to cook something. A tenderloin in a traditional deep fat fryer takes 5 or 6 minutes and the air fryer is more like 20 minutes. It is healthier, but when cooking for a family it takes a chunk of time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda V

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life changer I have made spring rolls, cooked breaded flounder, home made chicken nuggets, fries. And they all turned out so crisp minus the oil. I wish I had purchased it sooner
customer_reviews.author: sofia bennani

customer_reviews.title: to whatever this makes cooking a breeze and everything tastes amazing. just make sure to keep the vent away ...
customer_reviews.text: This changed our lives. From steak, chicken, french fries, to whatever this makes cooking a breeze and everything tastes amazing. just make sure to keep the vent away from walls or anything that shouldn't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S

customer_reviews.title: I loved the air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I loved the air fryer. Worked great used it a lot. Tonight it just died!! A call to Amazon and I'll have one at my door in two days!! I love Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not of good quality. The fryer basket falls out from the main basket. It doesn’t clean well at all. To get a warranty part, the process is ridiculous. They want you to take a picture of receipt, serial number, the broken latch, the invoice of purchase. Instead of having me send them the broken part, and they send a replacement. Absolutely terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I love fries and this product makes them great
customer_reviews.text: I love fries and this product makes them great.I've also tried fish fillets and they also turned out great.I love this because it needs no oil.I just can't wait to try something else.This product keeps me from using my oven.Thanks GoWISE
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: coating came off
customer_reviews.text: Used it with wax paper to minimize cleaning but coating started to come off anyways. Ended up not using as much as I would have liked. It's also hard to clean it because you can't really see what's inside and the basket is pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: You start with a Great system, but after 3 or 4 months of use its starts peeling off, we always use a non scratch sponge to clean. And in order to use the warranty you need to pay shipping back and forward, really?
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job of deep frying without the heat or fumes
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sis and she said she loves it, she has cooked fries that turned out great, next she is going to try breaded zucchini.
customer_reviews.author: Cizillie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it worked properly. The basket no longer holds in place though when you pull it out of the fryer which makes for a VERY hot and unsafe situation. Replacement process hasn’t worked either
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M. Locke

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using airfryer about 4 years. The first one I used nearly 4 years and it worked very well. And I just bought 2nd one about a month ago (exactly same product), but the 2nd one already peeled out the bottom area as picture. I used soft scrubberto clean it. Unfortunately when I noticed the problem it was after 30 days (returned allowed only 30 days) I am not happy with this product now.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Chung

customer_reviews.title: Coating chipped after 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: After about 14 months and used maybe 10 times, the coating in the food basket and on the bottom of the pot chipped. Customer service told me my one year warranty was up but they would gladly SELL me replacement parts. Ha. I told him I would just write this review of a product no one else should buy
customer_reviews.author: EdBoo

customer_reviews.title: better buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: great buy as good as high dollar ones dose the same thing at great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my air fryer. Just what a widower needs for quick, easy and healty meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality,  Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer! I was very surprised how well it cooked steak. It is Also great for chicken wings, shrimp anda so much more!
customer_reviews.author: RUOK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. avoid grease, low price, no frills. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brower

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work loves this product. After I got one for the break room, everyone orders one for their houses. Simple and great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. It is a gamble if you have to very precise with temperature though as it few graduations. However it does its job and is not very loud
customer_reviews.author: Henloy A.

customer_reviews.title: Probably works for some things, but did not meet expectations.
customer_reviews.text: One of the main things we purchased it for was to make sweet potatoes fries that were crispy on the outside, cooked well on the inside, but not burnt. It did not do this well, so my wife was very disappointed. But again, it might be great for other uses. I do not know.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Teig

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Used this a few times over 3 months and it is falling apart. Basket has a release button for cleaning, but it releases without touching the button. Dangerous with hot food and annoying that it happens 3 months after purchase. I will avoid this one in the future. $60 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love this air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my kitchen appliances. So easy to use. The only down side is some of the black coating on the basket has gone away to reveal a gray color underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Light

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My first one virile within a week but I like the product so much that I replaced it for a newer model
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy too use I bought one for me and another as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: air fryer
customer_reviews.text: it works great .great price..temp and timer dials should be marked a little better to make it easier to read.not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: steven carlo

customer_reviews.title: so far love it, does well on lower power
customer_reviews.text: so far love it, does well on lower power, ie 350-380 compared to my former ones that I had to run at 400
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer... use it every practically every day with fish and veggies oh and chicken tenders and I don't have to heat up my apt with the oven
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Must have for busy lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is a good alternative to meal prepping since everything cooks so fast I can have my marinated food in the fridge raw and cook fresh daily. It cooks pretty much anything you can think of
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great--not crazy about the temperature control knob. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great--not crazy about the temperature control knob. It's a little hard to figure out where to line up the arrow. Have not received the repair coverage that I bought with it.
customer_reviews.author: B Swan

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY UNSAFE LOCKING BASKET FAILS WILL CAUSE INJURY BURNS AND OIL SPILL MESS
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY used less than 20 x iteam is very unsafe basket does not stay attached after cooking pull basket falls apart does not stay locked in place . Falls out hot grease will burn u and make a mess
customer_reviews.author: bobby digital

customer_reviews.title: Basket/tray broken after light use over 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, however after 6 months of light use a few times a month, the basket/tray no longer lock in place together. This causes the basket to fall/fly off every time I try to remove the basket/tray from the fryer. I would recommend a higher quality air fryer as this flaw is pretty dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: We went to use it the first time, the ...
customer_reviews.text: We went to use it the first time, the timer was on 2 minutes. Turn it to 3 min's to warm up, timer stayed on 3 mins. Turn it to 10 min's to cook fries, stayed on 10 mins.Timer seems to be a very cheap product. Will look for a different brand. Called product support. They said to return it. A cheap product from our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. LaRock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: We love it! We use it even to toast bread. It's so much better than the digital model! We just keep the temperature at 400 and turn the timer dial... Very simple!

customer_reviews.title: Rusty basket
customer_reviews.text: The fryer works great. I used it for french fries, soy based chicken, fish, beef burgers. They came out good. Downside - after 2 months of using the fryer, the basket started to rust. I had to return at loss of $12 for so called restocking fee.

customer_reviews.title: Food truly tastes like it's been fried and better because no oil and ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this air fryer about a week and it exceeds our expectations. Food truly tastes like it's been fried and better because no oil and no grease to drain. Crispy not greasy for everything we've tried: steak fries, egg rolls, sweet potato fries, tater tots, etc. Looking to try wings and shrimp next. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GoWISE USA 3.7-Quart Dial Control Air Fryer, GW22622
product_meta.description: The GoWISE USA air fryer allows you to enjoy your favorite fried snacks and food without the added calories. With a wide temperature range of 175°F - 400°f, the fryer allows you to prepare a variety of dishes from crispy fries to juicy wings with little to no oil, and in 30 minutes or less. This air fryer is designed to automatically turn off when the basket is removed from the air fryer or after the timer is done. Owner's manual includes cooking guide foods like fries, meat, poultry, snacks, cakes and muffins. Includes recipe booklet.
feature_bullets: Air fry your favorite foods with little to no oil. Thanks to the rapid air technology in this air fryer there is no need to use excessive amounts of oil when cooking your favorite fried foods.
Easy-to-use dual controls allow you to set temperature to 175F - 400F and cook from 1 – 30 minutes. The simplicity helps you when following along to recipes found online or in other recipe books.
Comes with a detachable basket to help transport hot foods onto plates making cooking safer for you and your family. The top has a handle that makes it easy to carry.
Indicator light lets you know when desired temperature has been reached. Just set the dial to the desired temperature and wait a couple seconds until light comes on.
Includes recipe book. This recipe book is filled with 50 recipes specifically made for GoWISE USA air fryers. Choose from a variety of meals to make for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or dessert.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars729 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
